meanings.definition: Covered with a layer of gold.
meanings.sent1: The overgilt crown sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The antique mirror was overgilt with intricate patterns.
meanings.sent3: The overgilt statue looked like a golden superhero.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as overgilt as her jewelry.
meanings.sent5: The overgilt armor gleamed like a thousand tiny suns.

meanings.definition: To cover with a layer of gold.
meanings.sent1: The artist decided to overgilt the frame of the painting.
meanings.sent2: She carefully overgilt the edges of the book with gold leaf.
meanings.sent3: The chef playfully overgilt the dessert with edible gold dust.
meanings.sent4: His words seemed to overgilt the truth with a shiny falsehood.
meanings.sent5: The sunset overgilt the clouds with a golden hue.
